NOTICE: Dear Players, In this game, we have deliberately blurred cultural symbols and artistic influences, using pseudonyms and metaphors to seal this story within a timeline distinct from historical reality. Thank you for your understanding and interest in Sultan’s Game! The game has now officially launched! We will continue with updates and debugging based on any feedback. If you encounter any bugs or have suggestions, please report them on our Discord (linked via the icon below) or through this online feedback form (https://forms.office.com/r/B58Kncp64u). Our translation of English text—comprising of roughly 1,000,000 words—is also undergoing continuous refinement to deliver an engaging experience. You are welcome to join our Discord or contact us via the form above to report any translation issues. We hope you enjoy Sultan’s Game!
RITE_FIGHT_EVENT_TIPS: During checks, your dice count will be affected by enemy stats.
RITE_AUTO_SETTLEMENT_TIPS: Once activated, the resolution of the current event will not be displayed.
RITE_STARTED_TIPS: You cannot move a card involved in a Ritual in progress.
SUDAN_BOX_TIPS_SUFFIX:
Drag the Sultan Card to the card box to redraw one Sultan Card, {0} times per turn.
{1} times left in current turn.
SUDAN_CARD_BREAKER_STEP1_NOTICE: Tap the screen to break the resolved Sultan Card.
SUDAN_CARD_BREAKER_STEP1_NOTICE_Gamepad: Hold {0} to break the Sultan Card
SUDAN_CARD_BREAKER_STEP2_NOTICE: Tap the screen to break the resolved Sultan Card.
SUDAN_CARD_BREAKER_STEP3_NOTICE: Tap the screen to break the resolved Sultan Card.
START_GAME_HAS_OLD_SAVE: A game is in progress. Starting a new game will overwrite the current save. Do you wish to proceed?
START_GAME_PROMPT_JUMP_TUTORIAL: You have completed the tutorial before. Skip tutorial?
WIZARD_SHOW_LEFT_SUDAN_CARD: You have broken {0} Sultan Cards, remaining {1}: {2}.
WIZARD_SHOW_LEFT_SUDAN_CARD_DESTROY_CARD: You have broken {0} Sultan Cards, remaining {1}: {2}.
WIZARD_SHOW_LEFT_SUDAN_CARD_PLURAL: You have broken {0} Sultan Cards, remaining {1}: {2}.
WIZARD_REDARW_NO_MORE_TIMES: You have used up your redraws. You must wait for {0} more day.
WIZARD_REDARW_NO_MORE_TIMES_PLURAL: You have used up your redraws. You must wait for {0} more days.
WIZARD_REDRAW_NO_MORE_CARDS: There is no Sultan Card left.
BACK_TO_ROUND_BEGIN_TIPS: Return to start of this turn
BACK_TO_LAST_ROUND_BEGIN_TIPS: Return to start of last turn
GAME_OVER_PROMPT: Would you like to accept this defeat?
GAME_OVER_BACK_TO_ROUND_BEGIN: Return to start of this round
DATA_COLLECT_TIPS: We only record players' choices in events and do not store any personal information such as player names.
HARMONIOUS_TIPS: Some scenes have been modified to ensure streamers from all regions can broadcast game content smoothly.
POINT_SHOP_DESC:
Everything that happens, all the weal and woe, shall be your chips to tip the scale of fate: Fate Points.

<align=center><size=160><sprite=13></size></align>

Spend Fate Points to claim boons that may guide you closer to the secrets hidden within this tale.

<sprite=0><indent=10%>Resolve Sultan Cards in game, or complete stories in A Thousand and One Nights to gain Fate Points.</indent>
<sprite=0><indent=10%>You need to activate a boon to use it during your journeys. Boons are automatically activated upon purchase.</indent>
<sprite=0><indent=10%>You can only activate or deactivate boons when you start a new game. Once a story is in progress, the threads of fate can no longer be tampered with.</indent>
OVER_RECORD_TIPS: The Gallery can display up to 200 endings. You can manually delete any unwanted endings.
OVER_EXTRA_TEXT: This time, you have successfully resolved [0.plural(Sultan Card, Sultan Cards)]. Fate has taken notice.
OVER_EXTRA_TEXT_FOR_ZERO: You did not break a single Sultan Card. Nothing has changed.
STORY_DESC: Complete stories in A Thousand and One Nights to gain Fate Points.
MAIN_GAME_START_NEW_GAME_PROMPT: Current progress will be lost. Do you want to start a new game?
MAIN_HELP_SUDAN_BOX_PROMPT: Click to summon the Magician. She is more than happy to answer your questions. Every 7 days you have a chance to redraw a Sultan Card here.
MAIN_HELP_STORY_PROMPT: Methinks, drag a card here to think on it.
MAIN_HELP_DEADLINE_PROMPT: Your Reputation will have an impact on certain Events occurring.
MAIN_HELP_HANDCARD_PROMPT: All cards at your disposal will be displayed here.
MAIN_HELP_MENU_PROMPT: If the Execution countdown reaches 0 and you still have a Sultan Card in your hand, you will be executed by the Sultan, spelling the end of the game!
MAIN_HELP_NEXT_DAY_PROMPT: Click "End Day" to advance game time.
MAIN_HELP_GOLD_PROMPT: Consuming a Gold Die during checks adds one success.
MAIN_HELP_BACK_PROMPT: With sufficient charges, you can return to the previous day at any time.
CARD_INFO_HELP_RARE_PROMPT: Indicates the tier of this card. Gold > Silver > Bronze > Stone.
CARD_INFO_HELP_MAIN_PROMPT: Indicates the status, attributes, and tags of this card, which will directly affect its use in Rituals.
CARD_INFO_HELP_EQUIP_PROMPT: If the current card type is Character and this Character is a follower of yours, you can directly drag cards with the Equipment tag onto the Character card for them to equip it.
CARD_INFO_HELP_EQUIP_SLOT_PROMPT: If the current card is a Character, here displays the types of Equipment that this Character can equip. A Character can only equip 1 piece of each type of Equipment: [Weapon] [Attire] [Accessory].
RITE_HELP_MAIN_PROMPT:
Place the corresponding card into the slot as required to perform the current Ritual.
Slots with red icon must be filled, or the Ritual cannot proceed.
RITE_HELP_DESC_PROMPT: There will usually be hints on how Rituals should be conducted and their potential outcomes.
RITE_HELP_TIME_PROMPT: Indicates how many days are needed to complete the current Ritual.
BEGIN_GUIDE_RIGHT_CLICK_SLOT_PROMPT: Click a Card Slot to filter placeable cards.
BEGIN_GUIDE_RIGHT_CLICK_CARD_PROMPT: Right-click a card to quickly place it in a slot.
BEGIN_GUIDE_FILL_COIN_PROMPT: Double right-click a Gold Coin Card to automatically fulfill the gold amount required by Extravagance Cards.
BEGIN_GUIDE_REDRAW_SUDAN_CARD_PROMPT: Drag the Sultan Card to the box.
BEGIN_GUIDE_RITE_LAST_STATE_PROMPT: Click the button to automatically fill in the last set of cards used.
BEGIN_GUIDE_RITE_CONFIRM_PROMPT: Click the button to initiate an event.
BEGIN_GUIDE_RITE_STOP_PROMPT: Placed the wrong card? Click the button to stop an event.
BEGIN_GUIDE_READ_BOOK_PROMPT: You've obtained a book. Try dragging it into Methinks.
BEGIN_GUIDE_BACK_ROUND_PROMPT: If needed, you can return to the previous day.
BEGIN_GUIDE_MAIN_HELP_PROMPT: Click the button to view function descriptions.
BEGIN_GUIDE_NEXT_DAY_PROMPT: Click the "End Day" button to advance the story.
BEGIN_GUIDE_CHANGE_SUDAN_CARD_PROMPT:
Unsatisfied with the drawn Sultan Card? You can exchange for a different Sultan Card. 
If you're confident enough, you can draw another Sultan Card.
BEGIN_GUIDE_RIGHT_CLICK_SLOT_PROMPT_Game: Select a card slot and press {0} to filter available cards.
BEGIN_GUIDE_RIGHT_CLICK_CARD_PROMPT_Game: Select a card and press {0} to quickly place it in the slot.
BEGIN_GUIDE_FILL_COIN_PROMPT_Gamepad: Select Gold Coins and press {0} twice to auto-fill the required amount for breaking an Extravagance Card.
BEGIN_GUIDE_REDRAW_SUDAN_CARD_PROMPT_Gam: Select a Sultan Card and press {0} to change it.
BEGIN_GUIDE_RITE_LAST_STATE_PROMPT_Gamep: Press {0} to auto-fill the previously used cards.
BEGIN_GUIDE_RITE_STOP_PROMPT_Gamepad: Placed the wrong card? Press {0} to cancel.
BEGIN_GUIDE_READ_BOOK_PROMPT_Gamepad: You have obtained a book. Select it and press {0} to add it to Methinks.
BEGIN_GUIDE_BACK_ROUND_PROMPT_Gamepad: If needed, press {0} to rewind to the previous day.
BEGIN_GUIDE_MAIN_HELP_PROMPT_Gamepad: Hold {0} to learn how this function works.
BEGIN_GUIDE_NEXT_DAY_PROMPT_Gamepad: Hold {0} to advance to the next day and progress the story.
RITE_HELP_TAG_PROMPT: The attribute check that will be performed in the current Ritual.
NOTE_RITE_DEAD: Event [rite.icon][rite.name] has been removed as it was not handled in time.
NOTE_RITE_ADSORB_CARD: [card.head][card.name] has become involved in the Event [rite.name]. Check it out.
PRESTIGE_TIPS_7100001: Renown: Reputation earned through good deeds. Your restraint in using the Sultan Cards to cause harm will also be reflected.
PRESTIGE_TIPS_7100002: Infamy: Your reputation for doing evil, largely stemming from abusing the Sultan Cards.
PRESTIGE_TIPS_7100004: Notoriety: Your reputation among freemen, adventurers, and all who walk on the other side of law.
PRESTIGE_TIPS_7100005: Insight: The sight for things that are not, and thus should not be seen. This reflects your sensitivity to the otherworldly, to gods and spirits and worse.
PRESTIGE_TIPS_7100006: A Gold Die directly provides 1 success to the check.
PROMPT_CARD_ADD_lock_friendship: <font="Title SDF">· <size=125%><align=left>{0} has formed a {1} with you.</align></size></font>
PROMPT_CARD_ADD_kill_god: <font="Title SDF">· <size=125%><align=left>{0} moves to the front. He shall face this deity with you.</align></size></font>
PROMPT_CARD_ADD_minister: <font="Title SDF">· <size=125%><align=left>{0} has become the Vizier of the Empire</align></size></font>
PROMPT_CARD_2000168: <font="Title SDF">· <size=125%><align=left>You have suffered more Slanders against you in court.</align></size></font>
ITHINK_TIPS: Methinks: Drag a card here to think on it.
EXECUTION_DAY_TIPS: Complete the task of the Sultan Card before the Execution Day
OPEN_ON_OCT_NEXT_FEST: Update planned during the October New Product Festival, stay tuned!
DIFFICULTY_CHOOSE_DESC: Choose the Narrator for your story. Each Narrator corresponds to a different level of difficulty, but the story itself will remain the same.
BAG_AUTO_CLASSIFY_TIPS: When enabled, auto sort new cards from previous day.
PREV_ROUND_CONFIRM_PROMPT: Returning to the last turn will result in all process of the current turn being lost. Proceed?
SUDAN_BOX_REDRAW_CLICK_PROMPT: Click {0} to select the current Sultan Card for redraw
DATA_AGREEMENTS: We collect some of your in-game choices to optimize the gaming experience, but we do not record any of your personal information. You can turn this feature on or off in the settings at any time.
ILLEGAL_NAME: This name is not allowed. Please try another.
USER_ARCHIVE_SAVE_DESC: Once you load a save, you cannot return to previous turns.
USER_ARCHIVE_LOAD_DESC: Once you load a save, you cannot return to previous turns.
USER_ARCHIVE_ORVEWRITE_PROMPT: The save file already exists. Do you want to overwrite it?
USER_ARCHIVE_LOAD_PROMPT: Current game will be overwritten. Are you sure you want to load this save?
CREDITS_THANKS_2_DESC: <size=60%>这些玩家志愿者协助开发组进行了大量测试，这些工作是完成这个复杂作品必不可少的一部分，而大家提供的热情与支持更是反复激励了开发组的每一位同事——我们发自内心地感激这些朋友！
JOB_混音工程师/母带工程师: 混音工程师/母带工程师
